text: Angèle Dubos (22 December 1844 − 26 November 1916) was a French painter. Dubos was born in L'Aigle and showed her works at the Paris Salon. Her painting A New Song, dated 1879, was included in the 1905 book Women Painters of the World.Women painters of the world, from the time of Caterina Vigri, 1413-1463, to Rosa Bonheur and the present day, by Walter Shaw Sparrow, The Art and Life Library, Hodder & Stoughton, 27 Paternoster Row, London, 1905 ==References== ==External links== * Angèle Dubos on artnet Category:1844 births Category:1916 deaths Category:People from Orne Category:French women painters Category:19th- century French painters Category:20th-century French painters Category:19th- century French women artists Category:20th-century French women artists
title: Angèle Dubos
